name: video-games
title: Custom colors
description: Assign unique color values to fields to improve legibility. Easily tie metrics to their visual cues and swap colors on the fly.
mainGoal: Toggle custom colors and selected fields.
secondaryGoal: Click on a timeseries data point to filter the entire view.

name: auto-insurance
title: Filters
description: Filter your components and views with flexbile controls. Include a filter bar from the app or build triggers, simply.
mainGoal: Swap regional filters using custom buttons.
secondaryGoal: Use the filter bar to learn where the Learner's Permit age is 14

name: airline-survey
title: Formatters
description: Manipulate your data on the frontend. Shorten metrics, add units, and give meaning to empty values with custom formatters.
mainGoal: Toggle custom formatters and selected dimensions
secondaryGoal: Note how custom colors are used to imply aggreableness

name: job-market
title: Interactions
description: Use data point interactions to update components and views. Exchange views by simply changing the view ID.
mainGoal: Use the select bar to filter by Industry
secondaryGoal: Click on a bar column to drill into a new view
